description: The grouping of variables according to a certain aspect, e.g. how the information is modelled in the primary source.

containedBy.description: The resource, the variable group is contained by. Used to connect a variable group to its resource.

identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context. Persistent identifiers should be provided as HTTP URIs ([DCT, 2020-01-20](http://dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/2020-01-20/)).

label.description: The name of the variable group.

supersededBy.description: A merged item which is the preferred duplicate, because it replaces, consolidates or otherwise makes the current merged item obsolete.

title: Merged Variable Group
